name: REWIND SANDBOX
description:
FUN REWINDING SIMULATOR

IN THIS GAME YOU CAN DO WHATEVER YOU WOULD LIKE

 (ESPECIALLY REWIND TIME)

YOUR RULES YOUR GAMES YOUR LOGIC

CONTROLS:

Q - REWIND TIME

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - CREATE EXPLOSIONS AND SLOW DOWN TIME

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK - CREATE SOME BLOCKS SO THAT YOU CAN DO YOUR LOGIC WITH

SHIFT - SPRINT

R - RESTART LEVEL

HAVE FUN WITH THE GAME

(just remember that the performance might be a bit slow in browser but it will improve and run smoother once the download link comes :D)

PLEASE GIVE ME FEEDBACKS AND SUGGESTIONS. 

ALL FEEDBACK AND SUGGESTIONS ARE MOST WELCOME!

THANKS
